title: Version 1.13.2 failes to build - maybe a bug?
body:
I've just updated the dependencies in my project (sadly not opensource), and immediately I've started getting the following error when I try to build the project:

```
Error: ../../../go/pkg/mod/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum@v1.13.2/crypto/kzg4844/kzg4844_gokzg.go:52:66: cannot convert blob (variable of type Blob) to type gokzg4844.Blob
Error: ../../../go/pkg/mod/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum@v1.13.2/crypto/kzg4844/kzg4844_gokzg.go:64:64: cannot convert blob (variable of type Blob) to type gokzg4844.Blob
Error: ../../../go/pkg/mod/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum@v1.13.2/crypto/kzg4844/kzg4844_gokzg.go:86:61: cannot convert blob (variable of type Blob) to type gokzg4844.Blob
Error: ../../../go/pkg/mod/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum@v1.13.2/crypto/kzg4844/kzg4844_gokzg.go:97:53: cannot convert blob (variable of type Blob) to type gokzg4844.Blob
```

No other errors reported, in any other packages nor in my code. That's why I suspect that it may be a bug?

Thanks!

**Update**: Forgot to mention, I'm using Golang `1.21.1` on Ubuntu 22.04.
